translations.english: The edict commanded that anyone who followed the king would have their three clans executed.

translations.chinese: 郎中田叔、孟舒等十人自髡鉗為王家奴，從王就獄。
translations.english: Palace gentlemen Tian Shu, Meng Shu and ten others shaved their heads and wore cangues to become the king's household slaves, following the king to prison.
The king truly did not know of their plot.

translations.chinese: 春正月，廢趙王敖為宣平侯。
translations.english: In the first month of spring, he deposed King Zhao Ao as Marquis of Xuanping.

translations.chinese: 徙代王如意為趙王，王趙國。
translations.english: He moved King Dai Ruyi to become King of Zhao, ruling the Zhao kingdom.
